description:
On their rushing way to Saylague, Lina and her friends meet a young man named Harris. He asks Lina to be his bride for his false marriage because he`s been forced by a witch called Carry to marry her daughter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oh No! Lina no Kekkon Kyousoukyoku?
Oh no! リナの結婚狂想曲?
Oh non ! Rhapsodie pour le mariage de Lina ?
О, нет! Для Лины играет свадебный марш!
